data.name: Sock It
data.detailed_description:
THE STRANGE ADVENTURE THAT WILL HAVE YOU HEAD SCRATCHING FOR YEARS


Sock It is a wacky, completely unhinged comedy boxing game with platforming and cutscenes. Each boss brings its own spin to the formula. Different attacks are dealt with in different ways, and each new boss has a trick up its sleeve. If they have sleeves that is. Some of them don't. But they can keep new tricks in other places!

PREMISE


In a demented future, the boxer Alpha Piston has to fight a new circuit of strange baddies. Trained by a robotic nurse and unsure of his past, he has to fight
through weirder enemies than ever encountered before, find out about the accident that put him in cryostasis, and deal with having and apartment extorted to him.

But hey, at least he gets bodyguard services from that deal!

FEATURES


  • Box more than 12 crazy bosses!
  • Platforming stages to break up the action!
  • Cutscenes that guarantee 1 giggle (Usually around 5 hearty laughs)!

data.short_description: Sock It is a wacky, completely unhinged comedy boxing game with platforming and cutscenes. Box more than 12 crazy bosses! Platforming stages to break up the action! Cutscenes that guarantee 1 giggle (Usually around 5 hearty laughs)!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 10.10 or later
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS 12 Monterey
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and newer recommended
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ m3-6Y30 - 1.51 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.4 LTS recommened
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 515
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-Bit OS only
